short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stacklist saves websites as cards with tags & notes for easy organization and quick access to bookmarks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stacklist captures the current website you're on, including the website name, title, and URL, and allows you to add tags and notes. This becomes a saved Card in your Stacklist app and allows you save, organize and sort all your Cards making it easy to find all your favorite bookmarks in the future.
